note:
SFF writer & critic, author of the Teixcalaan series (A MEMORY CALLED EMPIRE and A DESOLATION CALLED PEACE).

Also, simultaneously, Dr. AnnaLinden Weller: city planner, climate & energy policy advisor, Byzantinist.

She/her. Currently based in Santa Fe, NM; never not a New Yorker by habit, birth, and inclination.

agent: DongWon Song, Howard Morhaim Literary Agency

(FYI: utterances here do not represent the New Mexico state government in any way.)
